message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $10000 to you.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. That's the most I'm willing to pay
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $8700. This is still a great deal for you, as you value the product at $10000. Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm trying to be as frugal as possible
